channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: Putin launched a regime change war, and some think he’s a victim. https://t.co/iA64jyGdpB
@jeffjarvis @KBAndersen @CNN @MSNBC @NewsHour CNN and MSNBC should teach us about the political system in Russia, a preview of our own system if we don't start fighting our homegrown fascists.

This fascist was president of the United States. https://t.co/StX5WDRsNj
I had a mentor back when I was a software entrepreneur. He told a metaphoric story how in the army they teach soldiers if they see a dead enemy on the side of the road, you should put a bullet in his head, just to be sure.
@jeffjarvis @mkarolian I hope he does follow through. We need another entry in this space. I posted a tweet for him with a plan. https://t.co/hcpdUTLlxO
Assistant Coach Immanuel Quickley. ;-) https://t.co/H50AoenpMp
Ohhh Biden said something you didn't like. How did you feel about this? https://t.co/StX5WDRsNj
Crypto does a lot of marketing. Still don’t see anything but a pyramid.
As Ukrainians die for freedom, Republicans cower before Trump. (Neither will the DOJ.) https://t.co/PQDXPoABnr

I don’t like it when pubs run ads that are links to stories I can’t read. If they want me to buy a subscription, have the decency to make a pitch. Otherwise I just request not to see anymore ads from them.
This Is What It’s Like to Witness a Nuclear Explosion. https://t.co/FrwmZXeFlq
This is lunacy. https://t.co/RUqu9A5GjY
@benj_fry @egrattan Please take me off the cc list. Thanks.
How to write a linter using tree-sitter in an hour. https://t.co/BU2UHz7xXF
@om @LAmag plus there's almost no distribution for half the movies that are nominated.
@KenSmith @dwaynebetts i bet it has a lot of vowels in it.
any network that doesn't allow peering is going to be under the same kind of political pressure twitter is to ban unpopular people.
The Pandemic Isn’t Over Yet, But Congress Is Willing to Gamble That It Is. https://t.co/vBDzO8b8RO
Breakthrough infections raise health, death risk; vaccine passports without testing allow cases to be missed. https://t.co/0dJoLBCO5l

"The Constitution is not a suicide pact" expresses the belief that constitutional restrictions on governmental power must be balanced against the need for survival of the state and its people. https://t.co/WmsMZ2mEsF
@Redpainter1 this person works for putin. don't push his message. please.

Defunding Fox News is an essential first step to maing America strong. President Biden could declare an emergency executive order. Say the truth about Fox. They are deliberately weakening America when we need to be strong. We need to sanction Fox News like we sanction Russia.
maing == making
Two comments to the commenters:
1. The constitution is not a suicide pact.
2. I pay for Fox News because I have a cable subscription. Let's start there. I don't want to pay that money. An executive order could say I don't have to.
@kevinhughes heh. jokes do not work on twitter. have a great day. ;-)
